thread.title: See Pic! Lisa Ray Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi
thread.title_full: See Pic! Lisa Ray Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi

title: See Pic! Lisa Ray Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi

persons.name: lisa ray meets his holiness dala

text:
Â» See Pic! Lisa Ray Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi See Pic! Lisa Ray Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi Lisa Ray flew down from Canada to Delhi to attend a private teaching of His Holiness Dalai Lama and also shared a picture meeting the religious head at the spiritual event.  33   
Lisa Ray who attended the two day event 'On Virtue & Vice' in Delhi, had the golden opportunity to meet His Holiness Dalai Lama and the actress shared a picture on her social media handle sharing a hearty laugh with the Buddhist religious leader.Check out the picture of Lisa Ray and Dalai Lama below! 'May the beauty of compassion find its place within, the mind's horizon forever expanding' #Vidyaloke @VanaRetreats @DalaiLama #Delhi pic.twitter.com/zsHK8tPL1o
